languages.text: {n}Заверитель склоняется над грамотой, сверкнув идеально выбритым черепом. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Аугментированные{/g} глаза-окуляры то и дело жужжат, приближая и отдаляя объективы механизмов. Когито-перья, заменяющие заверителю пальцы, со скрипом оставляют пометки на тонком листе бумаги.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Заверитель склоняется над грамотой, сверкнув идеально выбритым черепом. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Аугментированные{/g} глаза-окуляры то и дело жужжат, приближая и отдаляя объективы механизмов. Когито-перья, заменяющие заверителю пальцы, со скрипом оставляют пометки на тонком листе бумаги.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: {n}The certification officer leans over the document, his smoothly shaven head gleaming. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} ocular eyes whirr as the lenses zoom in and out. With quiet scratching sounds, the cogita-quills that serve in place of the officer's fingers make notes on a fine sheet of paper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}认证官伏在文件上，剃光了头发的脑袋看起来光溜溜的。他的眼球上安装着{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，随着镜头不断放大缩小，植入物也嗡嗡作响。他的手指已经被换成了带有沉思者的鹅毛笔，在精美的纸上做着记录，发出了安静的沙沙声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The certification officer leans over the document, his smoothly shaven head gleaming. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} ocular eyes whirr as the lenses zoom in and out. With quiet scratching sounds, the cogita-quills that serve in place of the officer's fingers make notes on a fine sheet of paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}认证官伏在文件上，剃光了头发的脑袋看起来光溜溜的。他的眼球上安装着{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，随着镜头不断放大缩小，植入物也嗡嗡作响。他的手指已经被换成了带有思考器的鹅毛笔，在精美的纸上做着记录，发出了安静的沙沙声。{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: {n}El oficial de certificación se inclina sobre el documento y su cabeza perfectamente afeitada reluce bajo la luz. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} oculares zumban mientras las lentes amplían y reducen su visión. Las cogitaplumas que hacen las veces de dedos del adepto toman notas con suaves crujidos en una delgada hoja de papel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The certification officer leans over the document, his smoothly shaven head gleaming. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} ocular eyes whirr as the lenses zoom in and out. With quiet scratching sounds, the cogita-quills that serve in place of the officer's fingers make notes on a fine sheet of paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial de certificación se inclina sobre el documento y su cabeza perfectamente afeitada reluce bajo la luz. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} oculares zumban mientras las lentes amplían y reducen su visión. Las cogitaplumas que hacen las veces de dedos del adepto toman notas con suaves crujidos en una delgada hoja de papel.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: {n}認証役が書類に向かって身を乗り出すと、つるつるに丸刈りされた頭がキラリと光る。{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーギュメント化{/g}したレンズの両目はズームインとズームアウトをするたびにウィーンと音を立てている。役人の指代わりにセットされた自律式羽ペンは引っかき音を小さく鳴らしながら、一枚の上質紙に書き込んでいく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The certification officer leans over the document, his smoothly shaven head gleaming. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} ocular eyes whirr as the lenses zoom in and out. With quiet scratching sounds, the cogita-quills that serve in place of the officer's fingers make notes on a fine sheet of paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}認証役が書類に向かって身を乗り出すと、つるつるに丸刈りされた頭がキラリと光る。{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーギュメント化{/g}したレンズの両目はズームインとズームアウトをするたびにウィーンと音を立てている。役人の指代わりにセットされた自律式羽ペンは引っかき音を小さく鳴らしながら、一枚の上質紙に書き込んでいく。{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: {n}La tête rasée de près de l'agent de certification luit alors qu'il se penche sur le document. Ses lorgnons {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentés{/g} ronronnent à mesure que les lentilles en ajustent la mise au point. De légers grattements s'élèvent de la feuille de papier sur laquelle les cogitaplumes qui lui servent de doigts consignent force renseignements.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The certification officer leans over the document, his smoothly shaven head gleaming. His {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} ocular eyes whirr as the lenses zoom in and out. With quiet scratching sounds, the cogita-quills that serve in place of the officer's fingers make notes on a fine sheet of paper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tête rasée de près de l'agent de certification luit alors qu'il se penche sur le document. Ses lorgnons {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentés{/g} ronronnent à mesure que les lentilles en ajustent la mise au point. De légers grattements s'élèvent de la feuille de papier sur laquelle les cogitaplumes qui lui servent de doigts consignent force renseignements.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: {n}Der Zertifizierungsoffizier beugt sich über das Dokument, sein sorgfältig geschorener Kopf glänzt. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentierten{/g} Augen summen, als die Linse heran- und herauszoomt. Mit einem leisen Kratzgeräusch machen die Cogita-Federkiele, die der Offizier statt Fingern hat, Notizen auf einem Blatt feinem Papier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The certification officer leans over the document, his smoothly shaven head gleaming. With quiet scratching sounds, the cogita-quills that serve in place of the officer's fingers make notes on a fine sheet of paper.{/n}

Mit einem leisen Kratzgeräusch machen die Cogita-Federkiele, die der Offizier statt Fingern hat, Notizen auf einem Blatt feinem Papier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sıfıra vurulmuş başı parlayan tasdikname memuru, belgenin üzerine eğiliyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Ogmentli{/g} oküler gözleri bir yakınlaşıp bir uzaklaşırken vızıldıyor. Memurun parmaklarının yerine takılmış kavramyazarlar, kaliteli bir kâğıt yaprağının üzerine not düşerken sessizce hışırtı çıkarıyor.{/n}
